0.cdata!:
Projet de la Centrale Thermo-Solaire de
            ain Beni Mathar : le cadre de politique de reinstallation et
            le plan de reinstallation involontaire

trustfund:
TF022942-GEF2:PDF C-MOROCCO :
            PREPARATION OF THE SOLAR BASED THERMAL PLANT PROJE

abstracts.cdata!:
This involuntary resettlement plan for
            the Integrated Solar Combined Cycle Power Project for
            Morocco expresses the objective to minimize the impact on
            people and habitations as well as environmentally sensitive
            areas while constructing necessary infrastructure to support
            the planned solar power station; identifies the persons,
            collectives, and businesses expected to be affected by
            project activities, and describes the legal basis and
            procedures for awarding them compensation.
